oscilloscup.system

Class Space

  • java.lang.Object
    • oscilloscup.system.SpaceElement
      • oscilloscup.system.Space

  • public class Space
extends SpaceElement

    A space is the abstract thing that defines the dimension X and Y. This models the mathematical concept of space.

    A space is made of:

    • 2 dimensions (X and Y),
    • an origin point with coordinates (0, 0),
    • a scale that calculates the position on a Java Graphics2D of a logic coordinate.

    The space features also a legend that will be drawn on top of the graphics representation.

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getOriginPoint()

        public void setRange(double xmin,
                     double xmax,
                     double xstep,
                     double ymin,
                     double ymax,
                     double ystep)
        Sets the range of the space. This is a facility method: this can be done directly manipulating the dimensions of the space. Warning! This is a convenience method. The Dimension, Graduation and AxisLine classes allow you to have a better control.
        Parameters:

        xmax -
        xstep -
        ymin -
        ymax -
        ystep -
